Kamala Harris would debate Donald Trump in Grand Rapids on this condition, campaign says  —  GRAND RAPIDS, MI — Campaign officials for Vice President Kamala Harris said they would consider debating Donald Trump in Grand Rapids, but first he must demonstrate his willingness to participate in an earlier commitment.
